T02D1397:124a-1: a'a rya manydzu shr'i n'a ma sam g'i ti by'a khya nam /
T02D1397:124a-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rnam par bshad pa /
T02D1397:124a-4: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhen nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1397:124a-5: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1397:124a-6: sngar nyid don dam thugs su chud kyang 'gro ba'i don du mngal gnas pa yi dpal ldan dang //
T02D1397:124a-7: gnas dang gnas pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs shing 'dod pa'i
T02D1397:124a-8: don grub brtson pa mchog / phyogs bcu rnams na
T02D1397:124a-9: 'tsho zhing gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa rnams kyi
T02D1397:124a-11: rab tu btud de ji bzhin sgra sogs sngam [*sdam?] dang mtshungs de yi bka' bzhin bri bar 'os //
T02D1397:124a-12: de la mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i don ma
T02D1397:124a-13: lus par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mi'i dbang po
T02D1397:124a-14: grags pa zhes bya bas don gsal bar bstan pa'i
T02D1397:124b-1: / gzhi dang de rkyen shes bya dang //
T02D1397:124b-2: drug gi rigs la gzigs pa dang //
T02D1397:124b-3: sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon byang chub //
T02D1397:124b-4: byang chub sems kyi rdo rje dang //
T02D1397:124b-5: chos dbyings me long ye shes dang //
T02D1397:124b-6: kun rtog mnyam nyid bya ba sgrub //
T02D1397:124b-7: bsdus pa rigs lnga bstod phan yon //
T02D1397:124b-8: sngags dang rjes su yi rang ba //
T02D1397:124b-9: mnga' bdag gsum gyi bdag nyid ni //
T02D1397:124b-10: gzhung don rtogs par sla ba dang //
T02D1397:124b-11: blo yi spyod yul 'gyur pa'i phyir //
T02D1397:124b-12: bsdus pa yin par shes par bya //
T02D1397:124b-13: zhes bya ba 'di dag legs pa nyid du gnas pa'i phyir de'i don la 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1397:124b-14: de la rgyud 'di ni skal ba'i rgyud de //
T02D1397:124b-15: sgyu 'phrul dra ba las bton pa'i phyir ro zhes kha cig 'ded do //
T02D1397:124b-16: de'i gzhung tshig la ni phun sum tshogs pa yang 'dod de //
T02D1397:124b-17: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud khri drug stong bar 'di
T02D1397:124b-18: skad bdag gis thos pa la sos pa gleng bzhi'i
T02D1397:124b-20: de bas na 'di ni gzhan gyi mtha' dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1397:124b-21: de nas zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1397:124b-22: de nas kyi sgra ni lnga pa'i tshig ste /
T02D1397:124b-23: sdud pa dang 'grel pa'i sgra las 'di ni sdud pa'i sgrar shes par bya'o //
T02D1397:124b-24: sdud pa yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1397:124b-27: de la 'di ni dus sdud pa ste /
T02D1397:124b-28: bar mchad par bsdu ba'i tshig go / de'i phyir ;
T02D1397:124b-29: dper na dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
T02D1397:124b-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te //
T02D1397:124b-31: de la dpal ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1397:124b-32: rdo rje ni de'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1397:124b-33: de bas na gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dang
T02D1397:124b-34: ldan zhing rdo rje'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pas na 'chang
T02D1397:124b-35: zhes bya'o // des ci byed snyam pa la /
T02D1397:124b-36: gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog / ces gsungs te /
T02D1397:124b-37: gdul bar dka' ba 'dul bar byed //
T02D1397:124b-39: 'dir 'dul bya yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1397:124b-40: zhi bas gdul bar bya ba dang /
T02D1397:124b-41: sdug bsngal myong bar byas te gdul ba'o //
T02D1397:124b-42: 'dir sdug bsngal myong bar byas nas gdul bar bya ste /
T02D1397:124b-43: nyon mongs pa rab tu che ba yang /
T02D1397:124b-44: bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam la dgod par bya'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1397:124b-45: nyon mongs pa rab tu che ba gdul ba la thabs rnam pa du ma zhig gsungs pa las /
T02D1397:124b-46: 'di ni mchog tu mi 'gyur pa ste /
T02D1397:125a-0: de'i phyir rnams zhes pa ni de rnams kyi nang nas 'di mchog tu @125a * //
T02D1397:125a-2: de yang skus 'dul ba la ni khro bo'i rnam pa dang /
T02D1397:125a-3: gsung gis 'dul ba la ni rdo rje thig pa dang /
T02D1397:125a-4: thugs kyis 'dul ba la ni bde ba'i ye shes so //
T02D1397:125a-5: de skad du dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba bde mchog las /
T02D1397:125a-6: shin tu khro zhing gtum pa la ;
T02D1397:125a-7: / zhi bas nye bar mi sbyor te //
T02D1397:125a-8: shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba las //
T02D1397:125a-9: khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad //
T02D1397:125a-11: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las kyang /
T02D1397:125a-12: de nas 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis ni //
T02D1397:125a-13: khro bo'i ming ni gshin rje'i gshed //
T02D1397:125a-15: drag la mthu rtsal drag dang ldan //
T02D1397:125a-16: de mthong nas ni khro bo gzhan //
T02D1397:125a-17: thams cad kyi ni lag cha 'chor //
T02D1397:125a-19: de bas na gdul bya ma rungs pa gdul bar
T02D1397:125a-20: bya ba'i phyir rdo rje 'chang de nyid kyi mtshan
T02D1397:125a-22: dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal ;
T02D1397:125a-26: gzugs med pa'i khams ni 'jig rten gsum mo //
T02D1397:125a-27: rgyal ba ni khams de dag na mthu dang /
T02D1397:125a-31: gnas kyis sems khengs shing dregs par gyur pa ste /
T02D1397:125a-32: de dag drag shul gyi spyod pas btul nas rang gi 'khor du byas pa ni rgyal ba'o //
T02D1397:125a-33: dpa' bo zhes bya ba'i don yang de nyid do //
T02D1397:125a-34: de dag gis ni rdo rje 'chang gi bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D1397:125a-35: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D1397:125a-36: brjod par bya ba dang brjod bya'i don dgos pa bstan pa'o //
T02D1397:125a-37: da ni rdo rje 'chang de'i che ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1397:125a-38: rdo rje dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyal //
T02D1397:125a-40: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1397:125a-41: dbang phyug ni chos thams cad la dbang du sgyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1397:125a-42: thun mong ma yin pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i phyir gsang ba'i rgyal po ste /
T02D1397:125a-43: rdo rje 'chang gi yon tan de 'dra zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1397:125a-44: da ni sku khro bos 'dul ba'i rgyun dang cha lugs bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1397:125a-45: padma dkar po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:125a-46: dkar nag phyed pa dang rgyas pa ste /
T02D1397:125b-0: @125b bcas pa padma'i 'dab ma lta bu'o //
T02D1397:125b-2: de ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyi don bstan nas 'khor bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D1397:125b-3: khor gnyer rim par ldan la sogs //
T02D1397:125b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsung ste /
T02D1397:125b-5: de la rang rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma 'dzin cing //
T02D1397:125b-6: lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ming can grangs
T02D1397:125b-7: mtha' yas pas nye bar bskor nas gtso bo'i phrin
T02D1397:125b-8: las dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir dang ga thams
T02D1397:125b-9: cad kyang khro bo'i gzugs dang ldan par ston te
T02D1397:125b-10: // de'i phyir khro bo'i gzugs de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1397:125b-11: 'jigs su rung dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:125b-16: dur khrod kyi rgyan dang ldan pa la sogs pa
T02D1397:125b-17: ste des rang gi sde pa nyan thos la sogs
T02D1397:125b-18: pa 'jigs shing skrag par byed pas na de skad
T02D1397:125b-19: ces bya'o // dpa' byad can zhes bya ba ni
T02D1397:125b-20: gang 'jigs rten na dpa' bo zhes bya ba ni
T02D1397:125b-21: dgra'i dpung pham par byas te mgo bcad nas 'ong
T02D1397:125b-22: ba ltar 'dis kyang ma rungs pa rnams kyi mgo
T02D1397:125b-23: bcad nas phreng ba byas pa dang /
T02D1397:125b-24: mgo bcad nas dbyugs pa la btsugs te lag cha byas pa dang /
T02D1397:125b-25: stag gi pags pas smad dkris byas pa'o //
T02D1397:125b-26: de ltar khro bo rnams kyi mtshan dang /
T02D1397:125b-29: de dag gi phrin las bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1397:125b-30: gdul dka' 'dul zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1397:125b-31: gdul bar dka' ba ni tshar gcad pa'i yul lo //
T02D1397:125b-32: de yang gdul bya'i snang ba la sku khro bo'i gzugs su bstan te /
T02D1397:125b-33: rang gi rigs kyi gtso bo'i mtshan ma ye shes kyi rdo rje bzung nas gsor bar byed cing /
T02D1397:125b-34: rdo rje'i rtse mo la yang blta bar mi bzod par 'jigs shing dus kyi me lta 'bar ba'o //
T02D1397:125b-37: ral gri la sogs pa mtshon cha'i tshogs dpag tu med pa rab tu spros te /
T02D1397:125b-38: gdul bya rnams sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar byas
T02D1397:125b-39: nas rang gi mgon skyabs med par shes nas rdo
T02D1397:125b-40: rje 'chang la skyabs su 'ong shing sems bskyed de
T02D1397:125b-41: bstan pa la 'jug par byed pa ni sangs rgyas
T02D1397:125b-42: phrin las byed pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro
T02D1397:125b-43: // de'i tshe la la ngag [?] 'di snyam du
T02D1397:125b-44: gang gi tshe gdul bya sdug bsngal bar gyur pa
T02D1397:125b-45: de'i tshe lag na rdo rje sdig pa'i bsam pa
T02D1397:125b-46: dang ldan no snyam pa la /
T02D1397:126a-0: @126a * // snying rje che dang shes rab dang //
T02D1397:126a-1: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:126a-2: snying rje ni gdul bya mnar med pa la sogs
T02D1397:126a-3: pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral bar bya ba'i bsam pa
T02D1397:126a-4: dang / des kun nas bslang ba'i khro bo chen po'i spyod pa'o //
T02D1397:126a-5: chen po ni sngar bstan pa'i mthu de lta bu
T02D1397:126a-6: dag gis rlom sems su mi byed pa sha stag
T02D1397:126a-7: ste / dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje chen po zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1397:126a-8: shes rab ni rnam par dpyod pa ste /
T02D1397:126a-9: gdul bya ji ltar 'dul ba'i rnam pa sngon du song ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1397:126a-10: dang zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa bsdu ba ste don byed pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1397:126a-12: thabs kyis 'gro don byed pa'i mchog / ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1397:126a-14: shes rab kyis kun nas bslang ba'i drag po spyod pa ni thabs su rig par bya ste /
T02D1397:126a-15: 'gro ba ma rungs pa'i don byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1397:126a-17: ma rungs pa rjes su 'dzin pa la thabs 'di
T02D1397:126a-18: las lhag pa med do zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1397:126a-19: // de ltar gtso bos sems can gyi don byed kyang /
T02D1397:126a-20: 'khor gyis sems can gyi don mi byed pa'o //
T02D1397:126a-21: byed kyang gtso bos nan gyis byed du bcug pa'am snyam pa la /
T02D1397:126a-22: dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can //
T02D1397:126a-24: dga' ba ni snying rje'i bsam pa can no //
T02D1397:126a-25: mgu ba ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1397:126a-26: yang na mgu ba ni sems can gyi don la yi rang ba'o //
T02D1397:126a-27: rangs pa ni 'gro ba'i don la 'jug pa ste /
T02D1397:126a-28: khro bo'i skur bstan pa yang bsam pa'i khyad par
T02D1397:126a-29: 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i phyir bsam pa can
T02D1397:126a-31: khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa //
T02D1397:126a-32: sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'i mgon //
T02D1397:126a-34: de'i phyir lag na rdo rje dag lus khro bo'i
T02D1397:126a-35: gzugs dang ldan pa yang bsam pa dge ba dang
T02D1397:126a-36: ldan pa'i phyir sdig par mi 'gyur ro zhes dgongs
T02D1397:126a-37: so // 'khor 'dus pa de dag kyang ston pa la ltos pa chen po nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1397:126a-38: lus btung rnams dang zhes gsungs te /
T02D1397:126a-39: kun mtshungs par gus pa'i tshul gyis lus btud pa'o //
T02D1397:126a-40: lhan cig tu zhes pa'i sgra thabs cig pa ste /
T02D1397:126a-41: 'di ltar lag na rdo rje rang gi rigs kyi
T02D1397:126a-42: mtshan ma 'dzin pa gang yin pa des bdag dang
T02D1397:126a-43: gzhan gyi don du gzhung gi don gsol ba gdab
T02D1397:126b-0: pa'i phyir lus btud @126b pa rnams dang /
T02D1397:126b-1: lag na rdo rje gzhan dag gzhung gi don nyan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1397:126b-2: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzhan gyi don
T02D1397:126b-3: du gzhung gi don bstan par bzhed pa gnas gcig
T02D1397:126b-4: na lhan cig tu bzhugs pa de'i tshe 'di skad
T02D1397:126b-6: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid gang yin snyam pa las ;
T02D1397:126b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das //
T02D1397:126b-8: rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1397:126b-9: de bzhin du gshegs pa dang /
T02D1397:126b-10: de bzhin nyid mkhyen pa dang /
T02D1397:126b-11: ji lta ba bzhin mkhyen cing gsungs so zhes gzhan dang sbyar ro //
T02D1397:126b-12: bcom ldan 'das ni spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D1397:126b-13: thob pa phun sum tshogs pa'i don to //
T02D1397:126b-14: tshig gi don ni gzhan las rgya cher gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1397:126b-15: rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i don ni rgyu'i dus su tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1397:126b-16: 'bras bu'i dus su bdag dang gzhan gyi don yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1397:126b-17: sangs rgyas zhes pa ni blo bye zhing rgyas pa'i phyir te /
T02D1397:126b-18: padma legs par bye zhing rgyas pa bzhin no //
T02D1397:126b-19: yang na nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pa'i phyir sangs rgyas te /
T02D1397:126b-20: skyes bu gnyid legs par sad pa bzhin no //
T02D1397:126b-21: de lta bu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhes
T02D1397:126b-22: bya ba'i don ni de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang
T02D1397:126b-23: ldan pa'i ston pa la 'di skad ces gsol to
T02D1397:126b-25: ci nas gsol ba btab snyam pa la phyag 'tshal te /
T02D1397:126b-26: thal mo sbyar nas gus pa'i tshul gyis spyan sngar 'dug ste zhes pa'o //
T02D1397:126b-27: de la phyag 'tshal ba ni lus ngag yid kyis rab tu btud pa ste /
T02D1397:126b-28: gus pa'i tshul gyis thal mo sbyar ba ni brda phrad par zad do //
T02D1397:126b-29: spyan sngar 'dug ces pa ni gzigs pa'i yul du 'dug pa ste /
T02D1397:126b-30: lkog tu gyur nas gsol ba ma btab ces pa'i don to //
T02D1397:126b-31: 'di skad ces pa ni ji skad du 'og nas gsungs pa'i gzhung gi don dgos ched dang /
T02D1397:126b-33: gsungs pa'i tshul bdag nyid snod du rung ba dang ;
T02D1397:126b-34: ma 'ongs pa'i dus su ji ltar sems can gyi
T02D1397:126b-35: don bya ba'i phyir de skad gsol ba btab na
T02D1397:126b-37: de dag gis ni sgra ji bzhin par bshad pa'i man ngag go //
T02D1397:126b-38: da ni bla ma'i zhal gyi man ngag sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa bri bar bya ste /
T02D1397:127a-0: de la khyed ltang na rgyud 'di gzhan gyi mtha' dang yang @127a * //
T02D1397:127a-1: dag par ldan pa yin te /
T02D1397:127a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs so //
T02D1397:127a-3: de bas na 'di nyid du phun sum tshogs pa'i gleng gzhi'i tshig go bar bya'o //
T02D1397:127a-4: de yang tshig gi don ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang /
T02D1397:127a-5: gdul bar dka' ba 'dul ba'i dus na 'khor lag
T02D1397:127a-6: na rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dpa' bo mtha' yas
T02D1397:127a-7: pa dang / khro gnyer can dang /
T02D1397:127a-8: sgrol ma la sogs pa lus btud pa rnams dang
T02D1397:127a-9: ldan cig tu padma rgyas pa'i gdan la bzhugs so
T02D1397:127a-13: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang lhan cig tu bzhugs
T02D1397:127a-14: pa de'i tshe chos phun sum tshogs pa brjod par
T02D1397:127a-15: bya ba 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02D1397:127a-16: gal te tshig gi don de ltar ston du zin
T02D1397:127a-17: kyang 'di skad bdag gis thos pa la sogs pa
T02D1397:127a-18: gleng gzhi tshig sgra ji bzhin du ston pa med
T02D1397:127a-19: pa'i phyir mi 'thad do zhe na /
T02D1397:127a-20: de ltar rtogs par mi bya ste ;
T02D1397:127a-21: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni tshig la mi dgyes
T02D1397:127a-22: shing don la dgyes par mdzad pas na bcom ldan
T02D1397:127a-23: 'das nyid kyis so sor rtog pa bzhi bka' stsal
T02D1397:127a-24: te / tshig la rton par mi bya zhing don la rton par bya ba dang /
T02D1397:127a-25: gang zag la rton par mi bya zhing chos la rton par bya ba dang /
T02D1397:127a-26: drang ba'i don la rton par mi bya zhing nges pa'i don la rton par bya ba dang /
T02D1397:127a-27: rnam par shes pa la rton par mi bya zhing ye shes la rton par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D1397:127a-28: de bas na don gyi dbang 'di la dgongs nas
T02D1397:127a-29: gzhan dag nas kyang sgra ji bzhin pa dang sbyar
T02D1397:127a-31: nam mkha' bems bcas dang ba dang //
T02D1397:127a-32: go skabs 'byed dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1397:127a-34: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
T02D1397:127a-35: zhes pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1397:127a-37: ye shes dbang phyug stong pa can //
T02D1397:127a-38: gnas gtsang ma na bzhugs nas su //
T02D1397:127a-39: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:127a-40: 'di dag kyang don gyi dbang 'di la dgongs nas gsungs par rig par bya'o //
T02D1397:127a-41: ji ltar gzhon nu ma mtshon pa la chung du dang /
T02D1397:127a-43: skra dang nu ma dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras mtshon pa'i tshig go //
T02D1397:127a-44: yang 'di skad du de lta mod kyi de nas
T02D1397:127b-0: zhes bya ba'i sgras bar ma @127b chad par sdud
T02D1397:127b-2: sngar sgyu 'phrul dra bar zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur
T02D1397:127b-3: bshad pa de ma thag pa'i de nas glu'i le'u
T02D1397:127b-4: 'di zhu ba bshad do zhes mtshams sbyar ba'i phyir
T02D1397:127b-5: dang / ji skad du smos pa'i le'u khri drug
T02D1397:127b-6: stong par 'di skad bdag gis thos pa la sogs
T02D1397:127b-7: pa gleng gzhi'i tshig gsungs pas 'dir yang sbyar ba
T02D1397:127b-10: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gcig tu mtshams sbyor bar ma zad de /
T02D1397:127b-12: yi ge aom dang de nas sgra //
T02D1397:127b-13: de dag gnyis ni sngon tshangs pa'i //
T02D1397:127b-14: mkhur ba phug nas byung bas na //
T02D1397:127b-15: de dag bkra shis sgra brjod do //
T02D1397:127b-17: rgyud 'byung ba'i thog mar shis pa brjod pa yin
T02D1397:127b-18: pas na de nas zhes bya ba'i sgrar gsungs so
T02D1397:127b-20: de nas kyi sgra ni aa tha ste //
T02D1397:127b-21: aa ni aa nutpa ta zhes pa ste shes rab po //
T02D1397:127b-22: tha ni pa ta yo ga ste thabs so //
T02D1397:127b-23: de lta bu'i sgra'i sgo nas ji lta bu yang sbyar du btub pas so //
T02D1397:127b-24: de bas na aa tha ae wam ste thabs shes rab po //
T02D1397:127b-25: de dag gnyis su med pa ni dpal lo //
T02D1397:127b-27: shr'i ni gnyis med ye shes te //
T02D1397:127b-29: tshig gi don du sbyar na shr'i la a'i yod pas na thabs nye bar sbyar nas phyis te /
T02D1397:127b-30: sha lar au ta'i rkyen byin pas shru ta'o /
T02D1397:127b-31: de lta na thos pa'i sgra te [*ste]/
T02D1397:127b-32: nyams su myong zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1397:127b-33: de'i bdag nyid ci 'dra zhe na /
T02D1397:127b-35: bdag gi ni de lta bu'o //
T02D1397:127b-36: da ma kee ni aee kee sgras te /
T02D1397:127b-37: gdul bar dka' ba 'dul ba'i dus gcig na zhes pa'i don te dus kyi khyad par ro /
T02D1397:127b-39: dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal //
T02D1397:127b-41: de yang 'jig rten gsum ni 'dod pa dang /
T02D1397:127b-44: de rnams su bdud bzhi'i dpung pham par byas pa'am /
T02D1397:127b-45: de gang gis bcom pa ni bcom ldan 'das te /
T02D1397:127b-46: zag pa med pa'i shes rab po //
T02D1397:127b-49: dpa' bo bdud dgra bdud 'dul ba //
T02D1397:127b-51: nyon mongs nye ba kun nyon mongs //
T02D1397:127b-52: bag chags bcas pa gtan spangs pa //
T02D1397:127b-53: zhes bya ba gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1397:127b-54: de nyid la 'jig rten las 'das pa dang 'jig
T02D1397:127b-55: rten pa'i dpal phun sum tshogs pa ni skal ba
T02D1397:128a-1: pa ste dbang phyug la sogs pa drug gi yon tan yod pa'o //
T02D1397:128a-3: yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes //
T02D1397:128a-6: mchog ldan mchog sbyin gtso bo ste //
T02D1397:128a-8: de bas na mtshan nyid de dag dang ldan pa la bcom ldan 'das zhes pa'am /
T02D1397:128a-11: rgyal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs su shes par bya'o //
T02D1397:128a-12: de gang na bzhugs snyam pa la /
T02D1397:128a-13: rdo rje dbang phyug ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:128a-14: de la rdo rje'i rigs ni rigs so //
T02D1397:128a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
T02D1397:128a-21: de rnams ni de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1397:128a-22: de nyid las phye ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D1397:128a-23: de bzhin nyid kyis dbang bsgyur pa'i phyir dbang phyug ces bya'o ;
T02D1397:128a-24: / gsang ba'i rgyal zhes bya ba ni gsang ba
T02D1397:128a-25: ni de rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba
T02D1397:128a-27: rgyal ba ni gtso bo ste snying po zhas bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1397:128a-28: de dag kyang gdul ba'i snang ba tsam la btsun mo nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1397:128a-31: padma ni mo rtags kyi sgra yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1397:128a-32: rgyas pa ni kha bye ba ste /
T02D1397:128a-33: 'di lta bu dag ni spyan zhes bya ba sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa'i bha ga rnams so //
T02D1397:128a-34: padma rgyas pa'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02D1397:128a-35: zhes pa ni padma yang yin la gdan yang yin pas padma rgyas pa'i gdan la ste /
T02D1397:128a-36: de ltar bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems kun
T02D1397:128a-37: da ltar dkar ba dbyer mi phyed pa'i ngo bos
T02D1397:128a-38: bzhugs te / bzhugs pa zhes bya ba ni gnas zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1397:128a-39: de yang bcom ldan 'das gdul bya rnams la spyod lam rnam pa bzhis bzhugs te /
T02D1397:128a-40: gshegs dang bzhugs dang de bzhin du ni gzims pa dang ni 'chag pa'o ;
T02D1397:128a-41: / yang na sku'i spyod lam ni ma rungs pa
T02D1397:128a-42: 'dul ba'i phyir khro bo'i cha lugs kyis bzhugs so
T02D1397:128a-43: // de la tshigs su bcad pa phyed snga mas ni zhal dang spyan gyi dbyings bstan nas /
T02D1397:128a-44: phyed phyi mas phyag mtshan dang phrin las bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1397:128b-0: rang gi lag gi rdo rje mchog / yang dang yang du @128b gsor byed pa //
T02D1397:128b-3: de'i phyir phyag gi rdo rje ni rang gi rigs mtshon pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1397:128b-4: mchog ces bya ba ni phyag rgya de'i khyad par ro //
T02D1397:128b-6: gsor bar byed pa zhes pa se ma rungs pa
T02D1397:128b-7: tshar bcad pa'i phyir nam mkha'i khams su lan du
T02D1397:128b-8: mar 'phen zhing phyag de nyid kyis 'dzin zhes bya
T02D1397:128b-10: gsung gi spyod lam ni 'khor rnams la rdo rje theg pa'i chos ston pa'o //
T02D1397:128b-11: thugs kyi spyod lam ni gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis mnyam par gzhag pa'o //
T02D1397:128b-12: de dag gi ni chos dang /
T02D1397:128b-16: gnas phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa ste /
T02D1397:128b-17: thog mar dge ba gleng gzhi'i don bshad zin to //
T02D1397:128b-18: da ni 'dus pa phal po che de dag gi ming dang /
T02D1397:128b-22: khro gnyer rim par ldan la sogs //
T02D1397:128b-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:128b-24: de dag gi ming nye bar bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1397:128b-25: 'di ltar khro gnyer can zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02D1397:128b-26: sgrol ma'i ming can la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma mtha' yas pa dang /
T02D1397:128b-27: gzhan yang lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ming
T02D1397:128b-28: can gyi dpa' bo grangs mtha' yas pa lus btud
T02D1397:128b-29: rnams dang lhan cig tu 'di skad ces gsol zhes
T02D1397:128b-30: pa ni bsdus pa'i don to //
T02D1397:128b-31: de la 'jigs su rung ba la sogs pa ni khro bo'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1397:128b-32: snying rje che la sogs pa ni bsam pa'i khyad par ro //
T02D1397:128b-33: sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa ni las kyi khyad par ro //
T02D1397:128b-34: lus btud ces pa ni thal mo sbyar nas tsog pur 'dug pa'o //
T02D1397:128b-35: rnams zhes pa ni dpa' bo dang dpa' mo grangs mtha' yas pa rnams so //
T02D1397:128b-36: dang zhes pa ni mtshungs pa bsdu pas te /
T02D1397:128b-37: kun kyang gnas der 'dus pas na lhan cig tu zhes pa'o //
T02D1397:128b-38: de dag gis ni gleng gzhi bshad zin to //
T02D1397:128b-39: da ni rgyud kyi don rnam pa gsum du bsdus
T02D1397:128b-40: nas gnas pa las rgyu'i rgyud kyi gleng gzhi bshad
T02D1397:128b-41: par bya ste / de yang rgyur rjes su 'gro
T02D1397:128b-42: zhing 'bras bu skyed pas na rgyud de sa bon
T02D1397:128b-44: sa bon ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1397:128b-45: de nyams su blang bar bya ba'i phyir thabs thun
T02D1397:129a-0: mong ma yin pa ni aa tha zhes @129a *
T02D1397:129a-2: aa ni srub pa dang bsrub par bya ba ste /
T02D1397:129a-4: tha ni srub par byed pa ste /
T02D1397:129a-6: de ltar bsrub pa dang bsrubs pa las byung ba ni dpal ldan zhes gsungs te /
T02D1397:129a-7: gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1397:129a-9: shr'i ni gnyis med ye shes te //
T02D1397:129a-11: gnyis su med pa de nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1397:129a-13: gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid ni rdo rje ltar
T02D1397:129a-14: gang gis kyang mi phyed pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan
T02D1397:129a-17: rdo rje mi phyed ces byar brjod //
T02D1397:129a-18: ces bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs so //
T02D1397:129a-19: de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi sems des ci bya zhe na /
T02D1397:129a-20: gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog / ces gsungs te /
T02D1397:129a-21: 'di ltar 'dul bar dka' ba ni thog ma med
T02D1397:129a-22: pa'i dus nas rtog pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i
T02D1397:129a-23: tshogs te / de 'dul bar byed pa ni gdul dka' 'dul ba'o //
T02D1397:129a-25: mos pa'i dbang du mdzad pa'i theg pa gsum gyis
T02D1397:129a-26: kyang de 'dul ba'i thabs yin gyi de rnams las
T02D1397:129a-27: mchog tu gyur pa ni gnyis su med pa'i byang
T02D1397:129a-28: chub kyi sems thabs gang gis skyed par byed pa
T02D1397:129a-29: ni mchog go // de yang thun mong ma yin
T02D1397:129a-30: pa'i thabs des gdul bar dka' ba rtsod pa'i dus
T02D1397:129a-31: kyi sems can 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs
T02D1397:129a-32: pa che bas kyang myur du byang chub thob po
T02D1397:129a-34: gzhan yang yon tan gyi khyad par ci lta bu dang ldan snyam pa la /
T02D1397:129a-35: dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal //
T02D1397:129a-37: 'jig rten gsum ni lus ngag yid do //
T02D1397:129a-38: de rnams kyi tha mal pa'i rnam rtog bcom ste
T02D1397:129a-39: sku gsung thugs rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid
T02D1397:129a-40: du ldan par bya bas na rgyal ba'o //
T02D1397:129a-41: tha mal pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'dzom pa'i dus
T02D1397:129a-42: na rim gyis rgyal bar byed pa lta bu ni
T02D1397:129a-43: ma yin te ; skad cig la 'joms par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dpa' bo zhes bya'o //
T02D1397:129a-44: lus ngag yid gsum gyi rigs kyi dbye ba spro ba dang bsdus te bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1397:129a-45: rdo rje dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyal //
T02D1397:129a-47: rdo rje ni rigs kyi sgra'o //
T02D1397:129b-0: de bas na lus ngag yid gsum las rgyas @129b par spro ba rigs lnga ste phung po lnga'o //
T02D1397:129b-1: de dag kyang nye bar bsdu na gcig kho na ste byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1397:129b-2: des de rnams la khyab cing dbang sgyur pas na dbang phyug go //
T02D1397:129b-3: de ltar shin tu spros pa ni rigs brgya'i dbye ba la'ang rab tu 'jug go //
T02D1397:129b-4: de ltar rigs kyi dbye ba grangs dpag tu med
T02D1397:129b-5: pa dag tu rab tu phye ba yang gsum du
T02D1397:129b-6: bsdus pa nyid kyi phyir gsang ba'i rgyal po ste
T02D1397:129b-7: / sku gsung thugs zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1397:129b-8: rgyal po ni gtso bo ste /
T02D1397:129b-9: gzhan du na snying po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1397:129b-10: snying po de nyid shes rab kyi ngo bo de
T02D1397:129b-11: bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyed cing rten du bstan par
T02D1397:129b-12: bya ba'i phyir / padma dkar po rgyas 'dra'i spyan //
T02D1397:129b-14: padma ni mo rtags kyi bstan pa'o //
T02D1397:129b-15: spyan ni sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa ste /
T02D1397:129b-16: sa la sogs pa ni khams bzhi'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1397:129b-17: 'dra zhes bya ba brten pa dang skyed par byed
T02D1397:129b-18: pa'i phyir ma dang 'dra zhes nye bar sbyar ba'i
T02D1397:129b-19: don to // rgyas pa ni byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po bzhugs pa'i gnas te /
T02D1397:129b-20: bde ba rgyas pa'i phyir kha bye bar gnas so //
T02D1397:129b-22: padma rgyas pa'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02D1397:129b-24: padma rgyas pa yang yin la gdan yang yin pas padma rgyas pa'i gdan no //
T02D1397:129b-25: na na'i don ni a'a sa na ste 'dir bzhugs par 'dod do //
T02D1397:129b-26: bzhugs zhes pa'i don ni shugs kyis ston pa'i sgra ste /
T02D1397:129b-27: ji ltar rgyal po'i pho brang zhes smos na rgyal po bzhugs par rig par bya ste /
T02D1397:129b-28: gzhung kha cig las bi dza h'a ra zhes kyang 'chad do //
T02D1397:129b-29: 'dir zab mo'i tshul ltar na thabs kyis bskul ba'i
T02D1397:129b-30: shes rab kyi padma rab tu rgyas pa la byang
T02D1397:129b-31: chub kyi sems kun da ltar dkar ba rgyu'i rgyud
T02D1397:129b-33: de dag gi rigs bstan par bya ba'i phyir na rang ni rang gi pa'o //
T02D1397:129b-34: lag gi ni bskul ba'i phyir te ma lta bu'o //
T02D1397:129b-35: rdo rje ni de dag las byung pa'i byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1397:129b-36: de khams gsum po skyed par byed pa'i phyir /
T02D1397:129b-37: yang nas yang du gsor byed pa //
T02D1397:129b-39: yang nas yang du zhes pa'i don ni srid pa'i rgya mtshor zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1397:129b-40: gsor zhes pa ni 'phen par byed pas te /
T02D1397:129b-41: bya ba la ltos nas byed pa zhes gsungs so //
T02D1397:130a-0: de'i don ni rgyud khyad par can smin par ma byas pa @130a * //
T02D1397:130a-1: las dang nyon mongs pa'i sa bon du gyur te /
T02D1397:130a-2: las dang 'bras bu la nye bar spyod par byed ces dgongs so //
T02D1397:130a-4: pha dang ma yi bde shugs las /
T02D1397:130a-5: skad cig de las khams gsum skyed //
T02D1397:130a-7: de dag gi rgyud la gnas pa'i 'gro bdag nye bar bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1397:130a-8: khro gnyer rim par ldan la sogs //
T02D1397:130a-10: nye bar mtshon pa'i khong khro ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1397:130a-11: nyon mongs pa rnams dang nye bar ldan zhes pa'i
T02D1397:130a-12: don to // lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa //
T02D1397:130a-13: zhes pa nas gsor byed pa zhes pa'i bar gyi
T02D1397:130a-14: rgyud de la gnas pa'i rigs gdul dka' ba'i rigs
T02D1397:130a-15: byol song dang yi dags dang dmyal ba la sogs
T02D1397:130a-16: pa 'gro ba drug spro bar byed pa'i don te
T02D1397:130a-17: tshig gi don ni go bar zad do //
T02D1397:130a-18: de dag gis ni rgyu'i rgyud kyi gleng gzhi'i don mdor bsdus te bstan pa'o //
T02D1397:130a-19: da ni thabs kyi rgyud kyi gleng gzhi bstan par bya ste /
T02D1397:130a-20: de yang nye bar 'gro bas na thabs zhes bya ste /
T02D1397:130a-21: rgyu de khyad par can du 'gro ba'i phyir te /
T02D1397:130a-22: rgyun rgyas par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1397:130a-25: aa ni lte bar gnas pa'i aa ste shes rab kyi ngo bo ae'o //
T02D1397:130a-26: tha ni spyi bo na gnas pa'i bam ngo ;
T02D1397:130a-27: / aa yongs su 'bar ba las rgyu'i rgyun la gnas pa'i bag chags bsregs te /
T02D1397:130a-28: thabs kyi ngo bo bam yongs su zhu nas byang
T02D1397:130a-29: chub kyi sems kyis slar gso bar mdzad pa ni
T02D1397:130a-30: dpal ldan no // de'i bdag nyid dbyer mi phyed pas rdo rje'o //
T02D1397:130a-31: gdul bya yongs su gdul bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1397:130a-32: gdul dka' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:130a-33: kun du rgyu ba spre'u dang 'dra ba rnam par shes pa'i tshogs so //
T02D1397:130a-34: de gdul bar byed pa bde ba chen po ste nang du dmigs pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1397:130a-36: sgo gsum gyi dri ma yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1397:130a-37: dpa' bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:130a-38: 'jig rten gsum ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gsum pa la spyod pa ste /
T02D1397:130a-39: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni de gsum gyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba ste rgyal ba'o //
T02D1397:130b-0: lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid @130b bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1397:130b-1: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:130b-2: rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'o //
T02D1397:130b-3: lus dang ngag dang yid gsum la dbang sgyur pas na dbang phyug ste /
T02D1397:130b-4: thun mong ma yin pa'i ye shes kyi phyir gsang ba'i rgyal po'o //
T02D1397:130b-5: da ni de dag gi don gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1397:130b-7: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:130b-8: padma rgyas 'dra ba ni padma dang 'dra ba ste /
T02D1397:130b-9: rtsa'i dbyibs padma rgyas pa dang 'dra ba gang la yod pa de la 'ang de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1397:130b-10: de yang bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis rtsa'i dbyibs dang grangs brjod par bya ste /
T02D1397:130b-11: gsang gnas ye shes kyi 'khor lo na padma rgyas
T02D1397:130b-12: pa 'dra ba'i 'dab ma sum cu so gnyis so
T02D1397:130b-13: // de bzhin du lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo na drug cu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D1397:130b-14: snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo na brgyad do //
T02D1397:130b-15: mgrin pa longs spyod kyi 'khor lo na 'dab ma bcu drug go //
T02D1397:130b-16: spyi bo bde pa chen po'i 'khor lo na 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
T02D1397:130b-17: gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo na 'dab ma brgyad do //
T02D1397:130b-18: de dag gi rnam par gzhag pas kyang ci bya snyam pa la /
T02D1397:130b-19: gdan la bzhugs zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1397:130b-20: padma ni mo rtags te bha ga'o //
T02D1397:130b-21: de rnams la bcom ldan 'das kun rdzob dang don
T02D1397:130b-22: dam pa'i bdag nyid can byang chub kyi sems su
T02D1397:130b-23: bzhugs zhes pa'o // de la gang zag tha mas ni lha'i skur bsgom mo //
T02D1397:130b-24: 'bring pos ni yi ge dgod par bsgom pa'o //
T02D1397:130b-25: rab kyis ni byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le bkod par bzhugs so //
T02D1397:130b-26: de nas nyams su blangs pa'i rim pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1397:130b-27: rang gi lag gi rdo rje mchog / yang dang yang du gsor byed pa //
T02D1397:130b-29: byed pa ni g-yo ba 'am rtsol bar byed pa ste /
T02D1397:130b-31: gsor byed pa ni spro bar byed pa ste tsanda l'i'o //
T02D1397:130b-32: des me ri'i mtshams kyi bar du sbar te lte
T02D1397:130b-33: ba sbrul ba'i 'khor lor bton nas snying ga chos
T02D1397:130b-34: kyi 'khor lo'i rtog pa rnams bsregs te /
T02D1397:130b-35: mgrin pa longs spyod kyi 'khor lo las byung nas mdzod sbu nas phyogs bcur spros te /
T02D1397:130b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar son
T02D1397:130b-37: pa'i dam tshig gi 'khor lor gyur pa dkrugs nas
T02D1397:130b-38: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi gnyis su med pa rdo
T02D1397:131a-1: rang gi lag gi rdo rje'i 'od kyis blangs te /
T02D1397:131a-2: mdzod sbur zhugs nas gtsug tor gyi 'khor lor dam
T02D1397:131a-3: tshig gi bdud rtsi dang gnyis su med par gyur
T02D1397:131a-4: te / 'khor lo rnams rim gyis gang bar bya'o //
T02D1397:131a-6: khro gnyer rim par ldan la sogs //
T02D1397:131a-8: khro gnyer rim par ni rim gyis 'gengs pa'i don to /
T02D1397:131a-9: gang gi tshe bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo gang
T02D1397:131a-10: bar gyur pa de'i tshe rtags nam mkha' la zla
T02D1397:131a-11: ba shar ba lta bu dang /
T02D1397:131a-12: de nas rim gyis longs spyod kyi 'khor lo khengs
T02D1397:131a-13: par gyur pa de'i tshe rtags nyi ma shar ba
T02D1397:131a-14: lta bu dang / de nas snying ga chos kyi
T02D1397:131a-15: 'khor lo khengs par gyur pa de'i tshe sngar gyi
T02D1397:131a-17: rtags rnams smig rgyu lta bu dang /
T02D1397:131a-18: de dag rim gyis sprul pa'i 'khor lor son pa dang /
T02D1397:131a-19: de'i tshe gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi lus nyid du 'gyur te /
T02D1397:131a-20: mun pa mun nag lta bu'i rtags 'byung ngo //
T02D1397:131a-21: de nas slar yang gsang gnas ye shes kyi 'khor lo nas bde ba bskyod de /
T02D1397:131a-22: rim gyis steng gi sgor bskyod de de bzhin gshegs
T02D1397:131a-23: pa rnams kyi sku sran ma tsa na ka'i tshad
T02D1397:131a-24: tsam du bzhugs par snang ba thabs kyi rang bzhin
T02D1397:131a-25: g-yo zhing spros te slar bsdu ba'i dus su ji
T02D1397:131a-26: skad du sngar smos pa bzhin du thig le'i ngo
T02D1397:131a-27: bor rnam par rtog pa rim gyis 'og gi sgor
T02D1397:131a-29: gang gi tshe lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor son
T02D1397:131a-30: pa de'i tshe dngos po dang mtshan ma las 'das
T02D1397:131a-31: pa'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1397:131a-32: gang gi tshe spro ba dang bsdu ba de'i tshe yon tan 'di dag dang ldan te /
T02D1397:131a-33: phyi rol gyi sdug bsngal thams cad gcod pa dang /
T02D1397:131a-34: sdig pa'i dngos po ma lus pa thams cad sreg pa dang /
T02D1397:131a-35: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje me lta bu 'phro ba dang /
T02D1397:131a-36: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gi gsung la dbang byed pa dang /
T02D1397:131a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye shes kyi sku mngon du mdzad pa dang /
T02D1397:131a-38: ye shes kyi skus 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1397:131a-39: sogs zhes bya ba'i sgras ni ye shes rnam pa
T02D1397:131a-40: lnga rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du skye ba'i
T02D1397:131a-41: don gzung ngo // lag na rdo rje'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D1397:131a-42: mtha' yas pa zhes pa ni dga' ba ste /
T02D1397:131b-0: ji ltar 'khor lo bzhir dga' ba bzhi @131b skye ba'i rim pa'o //
T02D1397:131b-1: de dag gis ci byed snyam pa la /
T02D1397:131b-2: gdul dka' 'dul ba po zhes gsungs te /
T02D1397:131b-3: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i tha mal pa'i shes pa ni gdul bar dka' ba'o //
T02D1397:131b-4: de lhan cig skyes pa'i ngang du nub pa ni 'dul ba'o //
T02D1397:131b-5: thabs ji lta bu snyam pa la /
T02D1397:131b-6: 'jigs su rung dad dpa' byad can //
T02D1397:131b-8: chags bcas kyi lam 'di la gzhan skrag pa'i phyir 'jigs su rung ba dang /
T02D1397:131b-9: ji skad sngar smos pa'i tsanda l'is ni de bzhin
T02D1397:131b-10: gshegs pa rnams kyang sreg pa'i phyir 'jigs su rung
T02D1397:131b-11: ba'o // dpa' ba'i cha byad can ni me lce'i bdag nyid can no ;
T02D1397:131b-12: / de'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu yin snyam pa la /
T02D1397:131b-14: gzhan gyis mi phyed pa'i rdo rje'i rtse mo'o //
T02D1397:131b-15: 'phro ba zhes pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D1397:131b-16: spro ba dang bsdu ba'i don dag thabs dang shes rab kyi ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1397:131b-17: snying rje che dang shes rab dang //
T02D1397:131b-18: thabs kyis 'gro don byed pa'i mchog / ces gsungs pa ste /
T02D1397:131b-19: snying rje ni spro ba'i dus su thabs kyi sku ste skye ba'o //
T02D1397:131b-20: shes rab ni bsdu ba'i dus su stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo ste 'jig pa'o //
T02D1397:131b-21: de lta bu'i tshul gyis 'gro ba'i don byed pa ste /
T02D1397:131b-22: 'gro ba zhes pa ni lam so so nas 'gro bas 'gro ba ste /
T02D1397:131b-23: dbang po'i lam nas 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1397:131b-24: don byed pa ni dam pa'i man ngag gis nye
T02D1397:131b-25: bar brgyan nas dbang po dang don sbyar zhing gnyis
T02D1397:131b-26: su med pa'i nyams su myong bar 'byung ba'o //
T02D1397:131b-27: de bas na de mchog go //
T02D1397:131b-28: sngar smos pa'i dga' ba rnams gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1397:131b-29: dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can //
T02D1397:131b-32: mgu ba ni mchog tu dga' ba'o //
T02D1397:131b-33: rangs pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1397:131b-34: bsam pa can ni dga' bral lo //
T02D1397:131b-35: nyon mongs pa ji ltar 'dul ba'i thabs su bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1397:131b-36: khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa ;
T02D1397:131b-37: / sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'i mgon //
T02D1397:131b-39: zhe sdang la sogs pa'i nyon mongs par rab tu
T02D1397:131b-40: grags pa yang lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs kyis 'joms
T02D1397:131b-41: par byed ces pa'i don to //
T02D1397:131b-42: sangs rgyas phrin las de lta bus 'gro ba 'dren pa ni mgon no //
T02D1397:132a-1: dang sems las byung ba thams cad lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1397:132a-2: lus btud rnams dang lhan cig tu //
T02D1397:132a-4: btud ces pa'i sgras ni gzhol ba dang /
T02D1397:132a-6: bab pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1397:132a-7: de dag gis ni thog mar dge ba'i gleng gzhi'i tshig bla ma'i man ngag bstan pa'o //
T02D1397:132a-8: da ni ston pa la gus pa'i tshul gyis gleng bslang ba'i phyir /
T02D1397:132a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das //
T02D1397:132a-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:132a-11: de la de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin mkhyen
T02D1397:132a-12: cing khong du chud nas ji lta ba bzhin gsungs
T02D1397:132a-13: pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02D1397:132a-14: bdud bzhi bcom pa'i mtshan nyid gong la yod pa de ni bcom ldan 'das te /
T02D1397:132a-16: dpal dang grags dang la sogs pa gzhan dang sbyar ro //
T02D1397:132a-17: gzhan yang mtshan gyi khyad par gsungs pa /
T02D1397:132a-18: rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes pa ste /
T02D1397:132a-19: bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa gong la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1397:132a-20: la zhes pa ni bdun pa'i don to //
T02D1397:132a-21: de ltar ston pa'i mtshan nyid khyad par dang ldan
T02D1397:132a-22: pa la yang dang yang du thal mo sbyar nas
T02D1397:132a-23: phyag 'tshal ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid gus
T02D1397:132a-24: pa'i tshul gyis yin par rig par bya'o //
T02D1397:132a-25: spyan sngar 'dug ste zhes pa ni /
T02D1397:132a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gzigs pa'i yul na 'dug pa ste /
T02D1397:132a-27: lkog tu gyur pa ma yin par zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1397:132a-28: de ltar gus pa dang spyan sngar 'dug pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1397:132a-29: 'di skad du gsol ba 'debs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1397:132a-30: ji skad du snyam pa la /
T02D1397:132a-31: khyab bdag ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:132a-33: de nas gang gi ched du gleng bslang ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1397:132a-34: bdag la sman pa dang zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:132a-36: sman pa ni bde ba'i rgyur 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1397:132a-37: de rang nyid kyis thob pa ni bdag gi don to //
T02D1397:132a-38: de'i phyir bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te /
T02D1397:132a-39: sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes bya ba'i thabs kyi sgo
T02D1397:132a-40: nas phan pa'i don mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
T02D1397:132a-41: pa bdag gis thob par mdzod cig ces pa'o //
T02D1397:132a-42: de ltar bdag gi don du gsol ba btab nas /
T02D1397:132a-43: da ni gzhan gyi don du gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir /
T02D1397:132a-44: nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs shing //
T02D1397:132b-0: zhes bya ba la sogs pa @132b gsungs te /
T02D1397:132b-1: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags dang /
T02D1397:132b-6: the tshom zhes bya ba rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /
T02D1397:132b-26: shes bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa zhes bya ba nye ba'i nyon mongs pa nyi shu'o //
T02D1397:132b-27: sems ni gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1397:132b-28: dkrugs pa ni glo bur gyi dri mas bslad pa ste /
T02D1397:132b-30: ji ltar rlabs kyis bskyod pa'i mtsho lta bu'o //
T02D1397:132b-31: de bsal bar byed pa'i thabs dang bral ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1397:132b-32: mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi //
T02D1397:132b-34: ma rig pas kun nas bsgribs pas glo bur gyi dri ma bsal ba'i thabs mi shes pa'o //
T02D1397:132b-35: dper na 'dam gyi tshogs chen po'i nang du nub
T02D1397:132b-36: par gyur na thabs mi mkhas pa rnams ni rang
T02D1397:132b-37: gi rtsol ba tsam gyis thar bar sems pa ste
T02D1397:132b-38: / de dag gis ni de'i rkyen gyis slar bying bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1397:132b-40: sems can kun zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1397:132b-41: sems rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs kyis kun nas bslang
T02D1397:132b-42: ba'i sems dang gang ldan pa de ni sems can
T02D1397:132b-43: no // kun zhes pa ni 'gro ba drug tu gtogs pa'i sems can ma lus pa'o ;
T02D1397:132b-44: / sngar rang gi don du skabs su zhugs pa'i
T02D1397:132b-45: thabs ni sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir 'di
T02D1397:132b-46: yang zhus par rig par bya'o //
T02D1397:132b-47: sman pa ni mi shes pa shes par bya ba dang /
T02D1397:132b-48: 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba las gdon par bya'o //
T02D1397:132b-49: de nyid 'bras bu khyad par can la dgod par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1397:132b-50: bla med 'bras bu zhes gsungs te /
T02D1397:132b-51: bla med ces pa ni de'i bla'am gong na 'bras bu mchog tu gyur pa gzhan med pa ste /
T02D1397:132b-53: de thob par bya ba ni mngon du gyur pa'o //
T02D1397:132b-54: phyir zhes pa ni ched du bya ba'i don te /
T02D1397:132b-55: de ci nas kyang thob par mdzod ces pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1397:133a-1: par gang dang ldan pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1397:133a-2: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:133a-3: rdzogs pa'i don ni sa mthar phyin pa'i don to //
T02D1397:133a-4: rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1397:133a-5: tshig gi don ni go bla'o //
T02D1397:133a-6: 'gro ba'i bla ma zhes pa ni 'gro ba rnams dang chos mthun pa'i tshul yin te /
T02D1397:133a-7: 'dir 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams kyi lam de
T02D1397:133a-8: nyid du 'dzud pa'i phyir snang ba mtha' yas la
T02D1397:133a-9: sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
T02D1397:133a-10: de bas na ston pa po ni rdo rje 'chad nyid do //
T02D1397:133a-11: dam tshig kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas dam tshig chen po ste /
T02D1397:133a-12: rigs dang nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba
T02D1397:133a-13: ji snyed du smos kyang rdo rje 'chang chen po
T02D1397:133a-14: las mi 'da' bas na de kho na nyid gcig
T02D1397:133a-15: tu mkhyen pa'i phyir chen po ste /
T02D1397:133a-16: de nyid mkhyen zhes pa'i don kyang de'o //
T02D1397:133a-17: de ltar don dam par de kho na nyid du
T02D1397:133a-18: mkhyen cing thugs su chud kyang kun rdzob kyi dbye
T02D1397:133a-20: dbang po bsam pa mkhyen mchog gis ;
T02D1397:133a-22: dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa'i mkhyen pa dang /
T02D1397:133a-23: bsam pa rgya che ba dang /
T02D1397:133a-25: tshad mar gyur pa mkhyen te /
T02D1397:133a-26: gdul bya'i snod kyi rim pa mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1397:133a-27: de yang cig car du mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir mchog go //
T02D1397:133a-28: gis zhes pa ni gsum pa'i tshig ste /
T02D1397:133a-29: zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med par mkhyen pa khyod kyis shes pa'o //
T02D1397:133a-30: da ni brjod bya'i khyad par can ji lta bu zhu ba'i phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1397:133a-31: bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku //
T02D1397:133a-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:133a-33: kyi zhes pa ni mang po'i tshig mi mngon par byas pa ste /
T02D1397:133a-34: 'di ltar 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da
T02D1397:133a-35: ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes
T02D1397:133a-36: kyi sku mkhyen pa mchog dang ldan pa khyed 'ba'
T02D1397:133a-37: zhig gis mkhyen gyis zhes tshig snga mar 'brel lo
T02D1397:133a-38: // de bas na ye shes kyi sku de ni
T02D1397:133a-39: thun mong du lta bar mi mngon pa'i phyir te
T02D1397:133a-40: // / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu'i gtsug tor bzhin no //
T02D1397:133a-42: gtsug tor chen po zhes pa ste /
T02D1397:133a-43: gtsug tor yang yin la chen po yang yin pas gtsug tor chen po ste /
T02D1397:133a-44: de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1397:133a-45: kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba las kyang shin
T02D1397:133b-0: tu ches gsang @133b ba brjod par bya ba thun
T02D1397:133b-1: mong ma yin pa bstan to //
T02D1397:133b-2: da ni brjod par byed pa gang yin pa dang /
T02D1397:133b-3: brjod bya'i rnam grangs yang yin pa phyin ci ma log par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1397:133b-4: tshig gi bdag po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:133b-5: tshig ni rjod par byed pa'o //
T02D1397:133b-6: de gang gis brjod pa ni bdag po ste /
T02D1397:133b-7: rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid do //
T02D1397:133b-8: 'dir tshig rnams la ma thob pas brjod bya thun
T02D1397:133b-9: mong ma yin pa brjod par mi nus so zhes
T02D1397:133b-10: dgongs so // de bas na brjod bya ye shes kyi sku ste /
T02D1397:133b-11: dngos su rang byung zhes gsungs te /
T02D1397:133b-12: 'dir rang byung ni rgyu dang rkyen la ma ltos
T02D1397:133b-13: pa'i ngo bo nyid ces slob dpon kha cig 'dod
T02D1397:133b-14: do // rang byung ni rang las byung bas na rang byung ste /
T02D1397:133b-15: brjod par bya ba thun mong ma yin par rang
T02D1397:133b-16: la sku dang ye shes kyi snang ba 'byung ba'o
T02D1397:133b-18: de nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi rnam grangs gzhan du na /
T02D1397:133b-19: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi //
T02D1397:133b-21: de yang skye ba dang 'gag pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1397:133b-22: zug rdu dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir 'jam pa
T02D1397:133b-23: ste / don dam par rtogs par bya ba de zhes so //
T02D1397:133b-24: bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bas na dpal te /
T02D1397:133b-25: sku dang ye shes kyi snang bar 'byung bas na
T02D1397:133b-26: de yang snang ba tha dad par 'byung du zin
T02D1397:133b-27: kyang ye shes ro gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ye
T02D1397:133b-28: shes sems dpa'o ; / de'i ming gi rnam grangs
T02D1397:133b-29: du mar brjod du zin kyang don ji lta ba
T02D1397:133b-30: bzhin du khong du chud par byed pa ni yang
T02D1397:133b-33: ming ni yang dag brjod pa'i mchog / ces gsungs te /
T02D1397:133b-34: mi zad pa dang rnam grangs gzhan la 'jug pa'i phyir ming ngo //
T02D1397:133b-35: yang dag bar brjod pa ni skyon med par brjod pa ste /
T02D1397:133b-36: rnam grangs phyin ci ma log par ston ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1397:133b-37: de bas na mchog kyang yin la /
T02D1397:133b-38: rjod byed kyang yin pas brjod pa'i mchog go //
T02D1397:133b-39: de dag gis ni brjod par bya ba dang brjod par byed pa yang bstan pa yin te /
T02D1397:133b-40: de dag gi 'brel ba ni thabs dang thabs las byung bar rig par bya'o //
T02D1397:133b-41: brjod bya'i dgos pa ni bdag dang gzhan gyis bla na med pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'o //
T02D1397:133b-42: de dag gis ni ston pa la ji ltar zhes pa dang /
T02D1397:134a-0: dgos 'bral gyi don sgra ji bzhin pa bshad zin @134a * //
T02D1397:134a-2: / da ni de dag gi don bla ma dam
T02D1397:134a-3: pa'i man ngag dang nye bar sbyar bar bya ba'i
T02D1397:134a-4: phyir / de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das //
T02D1397:134a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:134a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa ni byang chub kyi sems bde
T02D1397:134a-7: ba chen po ham gi gnas nas gshegs shing ae'i
T02D1397:134a-8: gnas su gnyis su med par gyur pa ste /
T02D1397:134a-9: slar rim gyis rang gi gnas su gshegs pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02D1397:134a-11: mgon po de bzhin nyid gshegs shing //
T02D1397:134a-12: slar yang de bzhin gshegs pas na //
T02D1397:134a-13: de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod par bya //
T02D1397:134a-15: de ltar gshegs pa dang byon pa'i tshe rags pa
T02D1397:134a-16: dang phra ba'i rtog pa bcom nas gnyis su med
T02D1397:134a-17: pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D1397:134a-18: so // bcom ldan 'das de ham gi gnas dang /
T02D1397:134a-19: ae'i gnas su bzhugs pa'i tshe rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te mthar phyin pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1397:134a-21: yang dang yang du goms par byed pa'o //
T02D1397:134a-22: thal mo sbyar zhes pa ni kha sbyar ba zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1397:134a-23: ji ltar na lus la gnas pa'i phyir /
T02D1397:134a-24: 'khor lo bzhi kha sbyar bar gyur pa'o //
T02D1397:134a-25: de yang ji ltar zhe na /
T02D1397:134a-27: chos kyi 'khor lo thabs dang shes rab po //
T02D1397:134a-29: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo yang thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du kha sbyar ba'o //
T02D1397:134a-30: nas ni zhes pa ni lnga pa'i don la gnyis pa sbyar ba'i tshig ste /
T02D1397:134a-31: de kha sbyar ma thag tu gang zag gis nyams su myong ba 'byung ba'i don to //

T02D1397:134a-34: de yang thabs dang shes rab kyi rtsa ba bstan pa'i phyir /

T02D1397:134b-0: ngo bo nyid kyis khyab pa'i phyir @134b khyab bdag go //

T02D1397:134b-11: de dag la thugs brtse ba dang bdag med par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir thabs 'di gsungs so //

T02D1397:134b-21: bdag gis byang chub ces pa'i tha tshig go //

T02D1397:134b-25: nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs shing //

T02D1397:134b-33: sems ni chos nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa'o //
T02D1397:134b-34: de mi gsal bar byed pa ni dkrugs pa zhes pa'o //
T02D1397:134b-35: mi shes pa ni nyon mongs pas dkrugs pa gsal bar byed pa'i thabs mi shes pa ste /
T02D1397:134b-36: thabs la rmongs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //

T02D1397:134b-39: sems can kun la sman pa dang //

T02D1397:134b-42: sems can ni yul dang dbang po la brten pa'i rnam par shes pa'i tshogs so //
T02D1397:135a-0: @135a * // kun ces pa'i sgras ni brgyad po nye bar bsdu ba'i tshig go //

T02D1397:135a-4: gang gi tshe 'bras bu thob pa'i mtshan nyid ci zhe na ;
T02D1397:135a-5: / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //

T02D1397:135a-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te //

T02D1397:135a-21: par byed pa'o // de ltar gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan nas /
T02D1397:135a-22: rang don phun sum tshogs pa de kho na nyid du mkhyen pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1397:135a-23: dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen //
T02D1397:135a-24: dbang po bsam pa mkhyen mchog gis //
T02D1397:135a-26: dam tshig kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas dam tshig chen po ste /
T02D1397:135a-27: shes bya thams cad de kho na nyid du mkhyen pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1397:135a-28: de ltar de kho na nyid du mkhyen cing thugs
T02D1397:135a-29: su chud de ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa
T02D1397:135a-30: dang / gdul bar bya ba'i gang zag gi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa dang /
T02D1397:135a-31: bsam pa rgya che ba dang chung ba mkhyen pa ni mkhyen pa'i mchog ste /

T02D1397:135a-33: yang na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni
T02D1397:135a-34: sngar bstan pa'i rnam par shes pa'i tshogs tha mal
T02D1397:135a-35: pa 'di nyid la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D1397:135a-36: ye shes kyi tshogs ston par byed pas na rdzogs
T02D1397:135b-0: pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das @135b te ;
T02D1397:135b-1: / lam so so nas 'gro ba'i yul dang dbang
T02D1397:135b-2: po la brten pa'i shes pa bla ma dam pa'i
T02D1397:135b-3: man ngag gis lhan cig skyes par ston pa ni
T02D1397:135b-4: ston pa'o // de nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1397:135b-5: dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen //
T02D1397:135b-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:135b-7: dam tshig ni brdar byas pa'o //

T02D1397:135b-9: la bde ba'i phyir ma spangs shing de kho na
T02D1397:135b-10: nyid du rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go

T02D1397:135b-14: mkhyen pa zhes pa ni de ltar rtogs zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1397:135b-17: gya nom pa zhes pa dang /
T02D1397:135b-18: bla na med pa zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi ming gi rnam grangs so //
T02D1397:135b-19: rtogs pa'i don khyad par can de nyid la mtshan
T02D1397:135b-20: gyi rnam grangs gzhan gyis bstan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1397:135b-21: / bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku //
T02D1397:135b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:135b-23: bcom ldan 'das ni 'das pa dang ma byon pa
T02D1397:135b-24: dang da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so

T02D1397:135b-26: de thun mang ma yin par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1397:135b-27: gtsug tor chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:135b-28: gang bdag gis thun mong du bltar mi mngon pa de la 'di skad ces gsungs so //
T02D1397:135b-29: de gang gis rtogs par nus snyam pa la /
T02D1397:135b-30: tshig gi bdag ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:135b-31: tshig gi bdag po bla ma dam pa'o ;
T02D1397:135b-32: / rtogs pa'i don de yang ci zhig gang nas 'byung snyam pa la /
T02D1397:135b-33: ye shes sku ste rang byung ba //
T02D1397:135b-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:135b-35: de'i don ni ye shes kyi sku'o //
T02D1397:135b-36: de yang rang las byung ba ste /
T02D1397:135b-37: gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1397:135b-38: de kho na nyid de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ste /
T02D1397:135b-39: yang dag pa'i ye shes me long lta bu la
T02D1397:135b-40: sogs pa rnams ro gcig tu gyur pa la mtshan
T02D1397:135b-41: gyi sgras brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1397:135b-42: ming ni yang dag brjod pa'i mchog / ces gsungs te /
T02D1397:135b-43: ming phyin ci ma log par brjod nas /
T02D1397:136a-0: don mchog dang phrad pa ni brjod pa'i @136a * //
T02D1397:136a-2: ngag gi skyon thams cad spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1397:136a-3: de dag gis ni ston pa la gus pa dang /
T02D1397:136a-4: gang gi ched du bsgom pa dang /
T02D1397:136a-5: khyad par gang dang ldan pa bsgom pa dang /
T02D1397:136a-6: ji ltar bsgom pa'i tshul bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag rnams bshad zin to //
T02D1397:136a-7: de dag gis ni brjod bya'i khyad par ji ltar zhu ba gleng ba bstan nas /
T02D1397:136a-8: da ni rjod byed gang gi don du zhu ba gleng bslang ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1397:136a-9: don zab don ni rgya che zhing //
T02D1397:136a-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:136a-11: don zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi sku rang byung yin la /
T02D1397:136a-12: de ston par byed pa'i tshig zab pa ste /
T02D1397:136a-13: theg pa thun mong bas rtogs par dka' ba'o //
T02D1397:136a-14: rgya che ba ni de ston par byed pa'i thabs mang ba'o //
T02D1397:136a-15: yang na sems can gyi don byed pa'i thabs mang ba'o //
T02D1397:136a-16: che ba ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don grub pa'o //
T02D1397:136a-17: mtshungs pa med pa ni theg pa gzhan dang 'gran du med pa'o //
T02D1397:136a-18: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir rab tu zhi ba'o //
T02D1397:136a-19: de ston par byed pa'i tshig gang yin snyam pa la /
T02D1397:136a-20: thog ma zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:136a-21: thog mar dge ba ni gleng gzhi'o //
T02D1397:136a-22: bar du dge ba ni gleng bslang ba'o //
T02D1397:136a-23: tha mar dge ba ni yongs su shes par bya'o //
T02D1397:136a-24: de yang ston pa 'di nyid kyis gsungs par ma zad de /
T02D1397:136a-25: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02D1397:136a-26: ma 'ongs pa ni byams pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1397:136a-27: da ltar ni sh'akya thub pa'o //
T02D1397:136a-28: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni bshad zin to //
T02D1397:136a-29: gsungs zhes pa ni de dag gis rnam grangs du
T02D1397:136a-30: mar gsungs kyang don ye shes kyi sku rang byung
T02D1397:136a-32: yang dang yang du zhes pa ni dus gsum du gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1397:136a-33: gsungs pa'i chos gang snyam pa la //
T02D1397:136a-34: rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las //
T02D1397:136a-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:136a-36: rgyud kyi dbye ba la sogs pa ni sngar bshad do //
T02D1397:136a-37: rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu gsum 'brel pas na dra ba'o //
T02D1397:136a-38: de'i ston pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1397:136a-39: des 'khor rdo rje 'chang rnams la bstan pas gsang
T02D1397:136a-40: sngags kyi lam la brten nas 'bras bu rdo rje
T02D1397:136a-44: 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'o //
T02D1397:136b-0: dga' bzhin du zhes pa @136b ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D1397:136b-1: dgyes pa dang bcas pa ste gsungs 'tshal zhes pa'o
T02D1397:136b-5: tshes grangs la ni mi ltos pas dga' bzhin du'o //
T02D1397:136b-6: dgyes pa nyid gang snyam pa la /
T02D1397:136b-8: gzhan gyi rgyud tshim par byed pas so ;
T02D1397:136b-9: / bshad du gsol zhes pa ni brda phrad par zad do //
T02D1397:136b-10: da ni gzhung gi don bdag dang gzhan gyi don du gzung bar dam bca' ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1397:136b-11: mgon po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:136b-12: mgon po zhes pa ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don du gyur pa ste /
T02D1397:136b-14: de la kye mgon po zhes bos nas rdzogs sangs rgyas ni bshad zin to //
T02D1397:136b-15: kun zhes pa ni bskal pa bzang po 'di'i sangs rgyas stong rtsa gcig go //
T02D1397:136b-16: gsang 'dzin zhes pa ni sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba 'dzin pa lag na rdo rje'o //
T02D1397:136b-17: ci nas bdag 'gyur phyir zhes pa ni bskal pa
T02D1397:136b-18: bzang po'i sangs rgyas de dag gi tha chungs lag
T02D1397:136b-20: de sangs rgyas de dag gi gsung ngo cog gi gsang ba 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1397:136b-21: sdud ba po byed par dam bca' ba'o //
T02D1397:136b-22: dus nam gyi bar du snyam pa la /
T02D1397:136b-24: bdag dang gzhan gyis bla na med pa'i byang chub ma tho ba [*thob?] kyi bar du'o //
T02D1397:136b-27: bsam pa ni thos pa dang bsam pa gnyis kyis so //
T02D1397:136b-28: brtan po ni ma nor ba'o //
T02D1397:136b-29: 'on te bdag 'ba' zhig gi don du 'am zhe na /
T02D1397:136b-30: nyon mongs ma lus bsal ba dang //
T02D1397:136b-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:136b-32: sems can nyon mongs pa rnams kyis sems dkrugs pa bsal ba dang /
T02D1397:136b-33: mi shes pa ni nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i thabs mi shes pa dang /
T02D1397:136b-35: grol bar byed pa mi shes pa ste /
T02D1397:136b-36: de spang ba'i phyir gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1397:136b-37: lam gnyis ni 'og nas ston to //
T02D1397:136b-38: 'on te chos kyi ser snas chu srin gre bar
T02D1397:136b-39: mu tig song ba bzhin du slar mi 'byung ngam
T02D1397:136b-40: zhe na / bsam pa'i khyad par ji bzhin du //
T02D1397:136b-41: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:136b-42: dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa'i rim pas
T02D1397:136b-43: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa la sbyor bar
T02D1397:136b-44: byed pas na / sems can rnams la bshad par 'tshal //
T02D1397:137a-1: / de dag gi mjug nye bar bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1397:137a-2: gsang dbang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:137a-3: gsang ba ni sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'o //
T02D1397:137a-4: dbang po ni bdag po ste /
T02D1397:137a-5: gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sdud pa po yin la /
T02D1397:137a-6: des de bzhin gshegs pa ni ji lta ba bzhin
T02D1397:137a-7: du mkhyen pa thugs su chud pa gsungs pa zhes
T02D1397:137a-8: bya ba ste // rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1397:137a-9: de skad du zhes pa ni bdag dang sems can
T02D1397:137a-10: thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa ma lus pa de
T02D1397:137a-11: bsal ba'i thabs lam rnam pa gnyis su gsungs zhes
T02D1397:137a-13: thal mo sbyar zhes pa ni brda phrad par zad do //
T02D1397:137a-14: lus btud pa ni gus pa'i tshul gyis tsog pur 'dug pa'o //
T02D1397:137a-15: spyan sngar zhes pa ni gzigs pa'i yul de na 'dug pa'o //
T02D1397:137a-17: gnas thun mong ma yin pa dag na /
T02D1397:137a-18: ston pa rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1397:137a-22: zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ming can gyis sdud pa po dang /
T02D1397:137a-23: gzhan yang lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ming can gyi dpa' bo mtha' yas pa dang /
T02D1397:137a-25: sgrol ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dpa' mo
T02D1397:137a-26: mtha' yas pa dang thabs cig pa de'i tshe lag
T02D1397:137a-27: na rdo rje stan las langs te /

T02D1397:137a-29: de nas bdag dang gzhan gyi don du lam sgyu 'phrul dra ba la brten nas /
T02D1397:137a-30: bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1397:137a-31: 'dir sngar smos pa'i tshig gis gsol ba btab nas so //
T02D1397:137a-32: 'dug ces pa ni sdud pa po sngar gnas pa
T02D1397:137a-33: bzhin du spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i tha
T02D1397:137a-34: tshig go // de dag gis ni rkyen gleng bslang ba bshad zin to //

T02D1397:137a-38: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

T02D1397:137a-40: mchog de gsol ba btab pa'i de ma thag pa'o

T02D1397:137b-0: sh'akya thub pa ni rdo rje 'chang gi mtshan gyi rnam grangs @137b te ;
T02D1397:137b-1: bstan pa gcig la ston pa gnyis kyi mtshan gyis 'dogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1397:137b-2: rdzogs pa'i zhes pa ni sa dang dbang dang mtshan nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //

T02D1397:137b-4: rkang pa ni 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i phyir te rkang pa dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D1397:137b-5: gnyis ni rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //

T02D1397:137b-7: nyid kyi zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
T02D1397:137b-8: 'chang kho na'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor nas ljags bzang
T02D1397:137b-9: po bkram pa ste 'dzum pa dang sbyar ro //
T02D1397:137b-10: ljags bzang ba nyid gang yin snyam pa la /
T02D1397:137b-11: ring zhing yangs pa brkyang mdzad de //
T02D1397:137b-13: ring ba ni ljags kyis zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khebs pa'o //
