T02D1397:178b-6: la lar ni rab tu 'byung ngo //
T02D1397:178b-7: la lar ni dka' thub mdzad do //
T02D1397:178b-8: la lar ni bsod snyoms mdzad do //
T02D1397:178b-9: la lar ni bdud 'dul bar mdzad do //
T02D1397:178b-10: la lar ni mngon par sangs rgyas so //
T02D1397:178b-11: la lar ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //

T02D1397:178b-24: de'i tshe kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu dang rkyen zhus so //

T02D1397:178b-30: ltar nga spyan 'dren cing 'gro bar ma zad de

T02D1397:179a-0: @179a * // lha dang lha dbang lha yi lha //

T02D1397:179a-18: srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal ba //

T02D1397:179a-32: de'i phyir 'gro ba rnams kyi bla ma'o //
T02D1397:179a-33: da ni che ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1397:179a-34: 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa //
T02D1397:179a-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

T02D1397:179a-43: chos kyi sbyin pa ni mtshon pa ste /

T02D1397:179a-46: snying rje yi ni ya lad bgos //
T02D1397:179a-48: rgyu byams pa dang snying rje las byung ba'i go cha'am /

T02D1397:179a-52: shes rab gsum ni ral gri dang 'dra'o //

T02D1397:179b-25: yang na bdud ni chu bo chen po bzhi'o //

T02D1397:180b-19: gzhan rig pa zhes pa ni /
T02D1397:180b-20: gzhan don lhun gyis grub pa ste /
T02D1397:180b-21: de'i phyir do yod grub pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1397:180b-22: bdag dang gzhan gyi don grub pas ci bya snyam pa la /
T02D1397:180b-23: kun la phan pa'i gang zag mchog / ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1397:180b-24: kun zhes pa ni sa ma pa tha ste /
T02D1397:180b-25: mnyam par byed pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1397:180b-26: de lta bu de ni gang zag rnams kyi nang na mchog tu 'gyur pa'o //
T02D1397:180b-27: dper bya kun las 'das pa ste //
T02D1397:180b-29: pho nya las thob pa'i de kho na nyid de ni dper bya ba thams cad las 'das pa'o //
T02D1397:180b-30: shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog / ces bya ba la /
T02D1397:180b-31: yul dang yul can du gyur pa thams cad de las byung ba'am /
T02D1397:180b-34: mchog ces pa ni gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1397:180b-35: gtso bo chos kyi sbyin bdag ste //
T02D1397:180b-37: gtso bo zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'o //
T02D1397:180b-38: chos shes pa ni lam ste /
T02D1397:180b-39: lam dang 'bras bu gnyis su med par ston pas na chos kyi sbyin bdag go //
T02D1397:180b-41: phyag rgya bzhi yi don ston pa //
T02D1397:180b-43: rdo rje theg pa'i lam ni phyag rgya bzhi'i don du bsdus pa'o //
T02D1397:180b-44: phyag rgya bzhi ni las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D1397:180b-48: de'i don ni skad cig ma bzhi ste /
T02D1397:181a-0: de'i phyir 'di la 'gro ba rnams kyi bsnyen @181a * //
T02D1397:181a-1: bkur bya bar 'os pa ste 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1397:181a-2: da ni don rnam par dag pa des gzhan gyi don byed par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1397:181a-3: 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gnas kyi mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:181a-4: phyag rgya'i don ston par byed pa de 'gro ba
T02D1397:181a-5: rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bya ba'i gnas su gyur pas
T02D1397:181a-6: mchog go // nges 'byung gsum po bgrod rnams kyi //
T02D1397:181a-7: don gyi dam pa zhes bya ba la /
T02D1397:181a-8: nges par 'byung ba ni 'bras bu ste /
T02D1397:181a-12: bgrod par bya ba ni lam yin la /
T02D1397:181a-13: de dag rnams kyi gtso bor don gyi dam pa 'di gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1397:181a-15: rnam dag dpal zhes gsungs te /
T02D1397:181a-16: rnam par dag pa ni 'di la de dag ldan pa ste /
T02D1397:181a-18: dpal zhes pa ni gnyis su med pa bdag dang gzhan gyi don thams cad 'byung ba'o ;
T02D1397:181a-19: /'jig rten gsum na skal bzang che //
T02D1397:181a-20: zhes pa ni lha dang mi rnams kyi phun sum
T02D1397:181a-21: tshogs pa 'di las lhag pa med pas skal ba
T02D1397:181a-22: bzang po'o // dpal ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa //
T02D1397:181a-23: zhes bya ba ni 'dis bdag dang gzhan gyi don
T02D1397:181a-24: phun sum tshogs pa 'grub par byed pa de skad
T02D1397:181a-25: ces bya'o ; / de gang zhe na /
T02D1397:181a-26: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog / ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1397:181a-27: gnyis pa thams cad kyi zug rdu med pas 'jam pa'o //
T02D1397:181a-28: bdag dang gzhan gyi don thams cad 'byung bas dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog ces bya'o //
T02D1397:181a-29: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes bshad zin to //
T02D1397:181a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa chos kyi dbyings
T02D1397:181a-31: kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod par bstan par
T02D1397:181a-33: mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
T02D1397:181a-34: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:181a-35: mchog ni rdo rje'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs ye shes kyi sku /
T02D1397:181a-38: dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i ming can te /
T02D1397:181a-39: rang yang mchog dang ldan pa /
T02D1397:181a-40: gzhan la yang mchog dang ldan pa sbyin par byed
T02D1397:181a-41: pa rdo rje ltar brtan la sra ba gnyis su
T02D1397:181a-42: med pa de gus pas nyams su blang bar bya
T02D1397:181b-0: ba la / @181b de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1397:181b-1: yang dag mthar gyur ces pa la /
T02D1397:181b-2: yang dag pa ni theg pa gsum mo //
T02D1397:181b-3: mthar gyur pa ni rdo rje theg pa'o //
T02D1397:181b-4: yang na de dag gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje 'chang ba chen po'o //
T02D1397:181b-5: stong nyid las byung zhes bya ba la //
T02D1397:181b-6: stong nyid ni gnyis su med pa ste ;
T02D1397:181b-7: de las byung ba'i ye shes kyi sku'o //
T02D1397:181b-8: yang na stong nyid ni pho nya'o //
T02D1397:181b-9: de las byung ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1397:181b-10: sangs rgyas byang chub ces pa ni /
T02D1397:181b-11: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rtogs par bya ba yin pas byang chub po /
T02D1397:181b-12: yang na sangs rgyas ni sgrub pa po'i phung po la sogs pa'o //
T02D1397:181b-13: byang chub ni rtogs par bya ba ste /
T02D1397:181b-14: 'dud ces pa ni rtogs nas nyams su blang bar bya'o //
T02D1397:181b-15: da ni rnam par snang mdzad la me long lta
T02D1397:181b-16: bu'i ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa bstan par
T02D1397:181b-18: sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud //
T02D1397:181b-19: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:181b-20: sangs rgyas ni dus gsum dang phyogs kyis bsdus pa'o //
T02D1397:181b-21: chags pa ni sems can gyi don la chags pa'o //
T02D1397:181b-22: yang na dman pa'i 'gro ba gar mkhan lta bu yang rjes su 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1397:181b-24: ces pa ni sems can rnams sangs rgyas rnams thob par 'dod pa'i phyir /
T02D1397:181b-25: sangs rgyas dgyes pa ni sangs rgyas par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu la dgyes pa'am /
T02D1397:181b-26: yang na sems can gyi don la dgyes par mdzad do //
T02D1397:181b-27: sangs rgyas rol la ni sems can gyi don mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyis rol pa ston pa'o //
T02D1397:181b-28: yang na pho nya'i bha gar lingga gzhag pa'o //
T02D1397:181b-29: de lta bu la phyag 'tshal ba ni gus pa'i tshul gyis so //
T02D1397:181b-30: da ni snang ba mtha' yas la so sor kun
T02D1397:181b-31: du rtog pa'i sgo nas bstod par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1397:181b-32: / sangs rgyas 'dzum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:181b-33: sems can gyi don du chos gsungs pa la 'dzum
T02D1397:181b-34: mdangs phyung nas tshems mche ba mngon par 'dzum pa
T02D1397:181b-35: mdzad pa'o // sangs rgyas bzhad la zhes pa ni 'di'i gsung snang ba mtha' yas yin la /
T02D1397:181b-36: sems can la gsung gis chos bstan pas rjes su 'dzin pas so //
T02D1397:182a-0: sangs rgyas gsung nyid ces pa ni chos rnam pa gsum @182a * //
T02D1397:182a-2: sangs rgyas thugs zhes pa ni gnyis su med pa
T02D1397:182a-3: las mi bskyod pas na thugs rnam par mi rtog
T02D1397:182a-4: pa la mnyam par gzhag pa'o //
T02D1397:182a-5: da ni rin chen 'byung ldan la mnyam pa nyid
T02D1397:182a-6: kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa bstan par
T02D1397:182a-7: bya ba'i phyir / med pa las byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:182a-8: bdag med pa las byung zhing sgyu ma'i dpe bcu
T02D1397:182a-9: gnyis dang 'dra bas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'am
T02D1397:182a-10: / yang na sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad 'byung bas rin chen 'byung ldan te /
T02D1397:182a-11: yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu'o //
T02D1397:182a-12: sangs rgyas 'byung ba zhes pa ni sku dang ye
T02D1397:182a-13: shes kyi snang ba zad mi shes pa 'byung ba
T02D1397:182a-14: ste / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan no //
T02D1397:182a-15: nam mkha' las byung zhes pa ni skye gnas kyi chos kyis mgos pa'o //
T02D1397:182a-16: ye shes las byung zhes pa ni mnyam pa nyid
T02D1397:182a-17: kyi ming can ye shes lnga gcig tu gyur pa
T02D1397:182a-18: ste / rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bya'o //
T02D1397:182a-19: da ni don yod grub pa la bya ba nan
T02D1397:182a-20: tan gyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa bstan
T02D1397:182a-23: sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i dus su dkyil 'khor
T02D1397:182a-24: gyi 'khor lo sgyu 'phrul dra ba mdzad pa ste
T02D1397:182a-25: / rlom sems med pas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1397:182a-26: sgyu 'phrul dra ba de nyid ji lta bu snyam pa la /
T02D1397:182a-28: sems can rnams la mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul du ston par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1397:182a-29: thams cad thams cad ces pa ni 'khor ba thams
T02D1397:182a-30: cad dang sgyu 'phrul dra ba lta bur khyod las
T02D1397:182a-32: mdor na rigs lngar ma zad par sgom dang mtshams ma yan chad la bstod pa'o //
T02D1397:182a-33: ye shes sku nyid ces pa ni zhus pa'i skabs su /
T02D1397:182a-34: ye shes sku ste rang byung ba zhes pa'i lan gsungs pa dang /
T02D1397:182a-35: gzhung gi brjod bya ba la bstod pa'o //
T02D1397:182a-36: ye shes kyi sku rnam 'phrul du 'byung pa'i sku ste /
T02D1397:182a-40: rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes bya ba'i ming can
T02D1397:182a-41: de la gus pa'i tshul gyis phyag bya bar 'os
T02D1397:182a-42: pa bstod par 'os pas de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1397:182a-43: rigs lnga la bstod pa bshad zin to //
T02D1397:182a-44: da ni chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i sngags bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1397:182b-0: aom @182b zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:182b-1: aom ni shis pa brjod par bya /
T02D1397:182b-2: sarba dharm'a zhes bya ba ni phung po dang khams
T02D1397:182b-3: dang skye mched kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad do
T02D1397:182b-4: // de rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1397:182b-6: aa bha wa ste dngos po med pa chu'i zla ba lta bur snang ba'o ;
T02D1397:182b-7: / de'i glo bur du ma yin te /
T02D1397:182b-8: sva bh'a wa ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa ste /
T02D1397:182b-9: bi shuddha zhes pa dang 'brel lo //
T02D1397:182b-10: rang bzhin dag pa de dag gang gis mthong zhing rtogs snyam pa la /
T02D1397:182b-12: snang ba dang stong pa dbyer med pa'i rdo rje de skad du bshad pa'i sangs rgyas spyan /
T02D1397:182b-13: la sogs pa'i thabs kyi phyed par gyis mthong ba'am rtogs pa'o //
T02D1397:182b-14: tshul ji ltar snyam pa la /
T02D1397:182b-16: a'a zhes pa shes rab gnyis las byung ba'i aam ste thig le kun rdzob kyi ngo bo dang /
T02D1397:182b-17: aa: zhes pa don dam pa skye ba med pa bde ba'i rnam par rtogs pa ste /
T02D1397:182b-18: mdor na chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa dngos po med pa ste /
T02D1397:182b-19: thabs kyi khyad par gyis gnyis su med pa'i bde
T02D1397:182b-20: bar rtogs shing khong du chud par 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1397:182b-22: da ni rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i sngags bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1397:182b-23: pra kri ti zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1397:182b-24: de ni rang bzhin rnams bcos pa'o //
T02D1397:182b-25: pa ri shuddh'a: zhes pa ni yongs su dag pa'o //
T02D1397:182b-26: rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa ste /
T02D1397:182b-27: yang gzhan du mi lta ste /
T02D1397:182b-32: de yang res 'ga' ba yin nam zhe na /
T02D1397:182b-34: ji srid du dag pa de yang gzugs la sogs pa'o //
T02D1397:182b-35: de nyid gsal bar bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1397:182b-36: sarba ta th'a ga te zhes gsungs te /
T02D1397:182b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dzny'a na k'a ya te ;
T02D1397:182b-40: pa ri shuddh'i t'a ni yongs su dag pa'o //
T02D1397:182b-42: d'a ye ti aa zhes pa ni go 'phang ngo //
T02D1397:183a-0: de'i don ni ji srid du chos thams cad yongs su dag pa ma bcos pa @183a * //
T02D1397:183a-1: gang la yod pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku /
T02D1397:183a-2: yongs su dag pa 'jam dpal gyi ming can de'i
T02D1397:183a-3: go 'phang thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha
T02D1397:183a-4: tshig go // da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1397:183a-5: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:183a-6: 'di ni rgyun du bgrang bar bya ba'i snying por shes par bya'o //
T02D1397:183a-7: sarba ta th'a ga ta ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
T02D1397:183a-8: hri da ya ni snying po ste ye shes kyi sku'o //
T02D1397:183a-9: des na ye shes kyi sku de de bzhin gshegs
T02D1397:183a-10: pa thams cad kyi thugs ka na gnas pa de
T02D1397:183a-11: rtogs pas ci byed ce na /
T02D1397:183a-12: ha ra ha ra ste tha mal pa'i lus dang /
T02D1397:183a-14: yid kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad 'phrog par byed pa'o //
T02D1397:183a-16: de gang gi snying po na /
T02D1397:183a-17: sku gsung thugs kyi snying po'o //
T02D1397:183a-19: khams gsum gyi rtogs pa 'phrog cing 'joms par byed pa'o //
T02D1397:183a-24: bha ga w'a na te bcom ldan 'das kyi'o //
T02D1397:183a-25: mtshan gyi khyad par gsungs pa /
T02D1397:183a-26: dzny'a na m'urti zhes gsungs te /
T02D1397:183a-27: ye shes kyi lus zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1397:183a-28: de tshig gi sgo nas ston par byed pas na /
T02D1397:183a-30: ngag la dbang byed pas na ngag gi dbang phyug go //
T02D1397:183a-31: tshig gi sgo nas bstan pas cir 'gyur snyam pa la /
T02D1397:183a-32: ma h'a w'a tsa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1397:183a-33: chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi skur 'tshed cing kha dog sgyur par byed do //
T02D1397:183a-35: sarba dharm'a ste chos thams cad do //
T02D1397:183a-37: ga ga na ste nam mkha' dang 'dra bar ro //
T02D1397:183a-38: aa ma la ni dri ma med pa'o //
T02D1397:183a-39: de nyid gsal bar bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1397:183a-40: su pa ri shuddh'a ste shin tu yongs su dag pa'o //
T02D1397:183a-41: de thams cad gar bsdu na /
T02D1397:183a-42: dharma dh'a tu ste chos kyi dbyings dang /
T02D1397:183a-43: dzny'a na garbha ste ye shes kyi snying po /
T02D1397:183a-44: aa: ste skye ba med par thim pa'o //
T02D1397:183a-45: de'i don ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1397:183a-46: thugs ka na bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das ye shes
T02D1397:183b-0: kyi sku de @183b tshig gi sgo nas bstan pas
T02D1397:183b-1: / khams gsum gyi lus ngag yid kyi nyon mongs pa 'phrog par byed pa'o //
T02D1397:183b-2: de'i mtshan nyid kyi khyad par bstan pa ni /
T02D1397:183b-3: chos thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra bar dri ma
T02D1397:183b-4: med par chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye
T02D1397:183b-5: shes so // des rnam par rtog pa thams cad
T02D1397:183b-6: de nyid du 'gyur par byed pa zhes bya ba'i
T02D1397:183b-7: shes so // tha tshig go // de dag gis
T02D1397:183b-8: rgyud kyi dngos po yongs su shes par bya ba'i
T02D1397:183b-9: shes so // tha tshig go // phyir / lan
T02D1397:183b-10: gnang ba bshad zin pa ste rdzogs zhes bya ba'i
T02D1397:183b-11: shes so // tha tshig go // phyir / tha
T02D1397:183b-12: tshig go // da ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
T02D1397:183b-13: pa'i don la rjes su yi rang ba'i tshul gyis
T02D1397:183b-14: gus pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1397:183b-15: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
T02D1397:183b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:183b-17: de nas zhes bya ba ni bar gang gis kyang mchod pa ste /
T02D1397:183b-18: zhus pa'i lan gsungs pa'i de ma thag pa'o //
T02D1397:183b-19: dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang ni sdud pa po ste /
T02D1397:183b-20: tshig gi don bshad zin to //
T02D1397:183b-21: dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar //
T02D1397:183b-23: sdud pa po chos thos pas dga' ba ste mdangs phyung zhes pa'o //
T02D1397:183b-24: mgu ni rjes su yi rang ba'o //
T02D1397:183b-25: thal mo sbyar ba ni gus pa'i don to //
T02D1397:183b-26: yang na dga' zhing mgu ba ni /
T02D1397:183b-28: mgon po bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1397:183b-29: zhes pa ni bdag dang gzhan gyi mgon mdzad pa la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1397:183b-30: de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'chang ste /
T02D1397:183b-31: ming gzhan sh'akya thub pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1397:183b-32: rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D1397:183b-33: zhes pa ni rang gi ston pa'i zhabs la spyi bos gtugs pa'o //
T02D1397:183b-34: de ni zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02D1397:183b-35: bdag dang gzhan gyi mgon du gyur pas so //
T02D1397:183b-36: gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal zhes pa la /
T02D1397:183b-37: sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba 'dzin pa ste bshad zin to //
T02D1397:183b-38: lag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal //
T02D1397:183b-39: zhes pa ni de'i ming can gyi 'khor rnams so //
T02D1397:183b-40: sna tshogs gzhan dang lhan cig tu //
T02D1397:183b-42: sgrol ma dang khro gnyer can la sogs pa'i dpa' mo rnams ni sna tshogs pa'o //
T02D1397:183b-43: gzhan zhes pa ni sdud pa po las gzhan du gyur pa'i 'khor rnams so //
T02D1397:183b-44: lhan cig ces pa ni de rnams dang mnyam por zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1397:184a-3: skad gsang la che bas 'og nas 'byung ba rnams gsol ba'o //
T02D1397:184a-4: da ni don chen po'i phyir rjes su yi rang ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1397:184a-5: mgon po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1397:184a-6: kye mgon po zhes pos nas bdag cag ces pa ni 'khor rnams so //
T02D1397:184a-7: yi rang ba ni mgu ba'o //
T02D1397:184a-8: legs so zhes bya ba ni bdag gi don du chos snang ba'o //
T02D1397:184a-9: yang legs so zhes bya ba ni gzhan don du'o //
T02D1397:184a-10: yang na lhag ma ma lus pa'o //
T02D1397:184a-11: legs par gsungs zhes bya ba ni sgra la skyon med de /
T02D1397:184a-15: rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i don du'o //
T02D1397:184a-16: 'gro ba mgon med rnams dang ni //
T02D1397:184a-17: bdag cag ces bya ba ni ji ltar rgya mtsho gru bzhi pa la sogs pa lta bu'o //
T02D1397:184a-18: byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzad //
T02D1397:184a-19: ces pa ni nyan thos dang /
T02D1397:184a-20: rang rgyal ba la sogs pa'i lam la ma bkod
T02D1397:184a-21: par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T02D1397:184a-22: byang chub la bkod par mdzad pa bka' drin chen
T02D1397:184a-24: thabs gang gi sgo nas she na /
T02D1397:184a-25: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul bstan pa //
T02D1397:184a-28: rdzogs pa ye shes kyi rnal 'byor ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste /
T02D1397:184a-29: de'i lam gyi sgo nas shes pa'o //
T02D1397:184a-30: 'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i lam //
T02D1397:184a-32: bshad ma thag pa'i lam 'di ni bde bas bde bar sgrub pa'i phyir /
T02D1397:184a-33: rnam par dag pa legs pa'i lam ste /
T02D1397:184a-34: dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa'i gshegs shul 'di
T02D1397:184a-35: bkod pa la rjes su yi rang ngo zhes bya
T02D1397:184a-37: da ni zab mo sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la
T02D1397:184a-38: rjes su yi rang ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1397:184a-39: / zab cing yangs la rgya che ste //
T02D1397:184a-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1397:184a-41: rdo rje theg pa ni zab ste /
T02D1397:184a-42: rtogs par dka' pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1397:184a-43: yangs pa ni 'dir kun shang pa'o //
T02D1397:184a-44: rgya che ba ni 'dir kun 'dus la theg pa gzhan du 'di ma 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1397:184a-45: don che ba ni bdag gi'o //
T02D1397:184a-46: 'gro ba'i don ni gzhan don te /
T02D1397:184b-0: de byed pa la de skad @184b ces bya'o //
T02D1397:184b-1: sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di ni //
T02D1397:184b-6: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin te /
T02D1397:184b-7: rdo rje 'chang chen po 'ba' zhig gi yul yin no zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1397:184b-9: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad //
T02D1397:184b-11: de dag gi phyir rjes su yi rang ngo zhes bya'o //
T02D1397:184b-12: de ltar bdag cag rnams kyang yi rang ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1397:184b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la rjes su yi rang ba bshad zin to //
T02D1397:184b-14: thog ma bar mtha' sgra'i gtso bo dang ldan rgyud
T02D1397:184b-15: kyi rgyal po 'gro ba'i don mdzad gsang ba zab
T02D1397:184b-16: mo'i don // zab cing rgya cher gyur pas 'di
T02D1397:184b-17: don legs par shes pa'i skye bos sbrang rtsi 'thung
T02D1397:184b-19: yi ge rig byed pa yi ming can de yis
T02D1397:184b-20: nye bar bzung zhing 'chi med mang 'thungs sgra ngan
T02D1397:184b-21: chen po de'i / gdams pa la brten bdag gi
T02D1397:184b-22: khe dang grags pa la sogs don gnyer min zhing
T02D1397:184b-23: rang gi blo gros rlom pas min //
T02D1397:184b-24: de yis gsungs pa glo rdol bum pa lta bur
T02D1397:184b-25: gyur pas 'jigs shing bdag dang gzhan don grub pa
T02D1397:184b-27: 'di bris pa las bsod nams ci yod des ni
T02D1397:184b-28: nyon mongs ma lus spangs dang de yi thabs la
T02D1397:184b-29: mkhas par shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang
T02D1397:184b-30: dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa 'jam dpal gyi sbrul
T02D1397:184b-31: pa me'i dbang po grags pas mdzad pa /
T02D1397:184b-32: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi bka' brgyud pa rdzogs so /
T02D1397:184b-34: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po aa bha ya badzra dang /
